refnamediv.refpurpose: The following is a quick set of examples showing how to utilise the library for managing Asterisk queues.

example.title: Get Queue Listing
example.programlisting:
<?php
    // Print all the queues on the server
    try {
        echo $ast->getQueues();
    } catch(PEAR_Exception $e) {
        echo $e;
    }
?>
example.screen: MARKETING has 0 calls (max unlimited) in 'ringall' strategy (0s holdtime), W:0, C:0, A:0, SL:0.0% within 0s Members: SIP/293 with penalty 1 (Not in use) has taken no calls yet SIP/216 with penalty 1 (Not in use) has taken no calls yet No Callers

example.title: Add to Queue
example.programlisting:
<?php
    // Add member to marketing queue
    try {
        $ast->queueAdd('MARKETING', 'SIP/234', 1);
    } catch(PEAR_Exception $e) {
        echo $e;
    }
?>

example.title: Remove from Queue
example.programlisting:
<?php
    // Remove member from marketing queue
    try {
        $ast->queueRemove('MARKETING', 'SIP/234');
    } catch(PEAR_Exception $e) {
        echo $e;
    }
?>
